reviewText: This was great, live in Moscow and St Petersburg. But you have to beware the titles, menu buttons and everything is in Russian. This could be a problem if you don't read Russian.

I found Vista by accident on YouTube. I really enjoy the vocal range and stage presence. Cant understand him, but music trnsendes that.
The advertising says all Regions. WRONG! Tried the DVD on Sony, Panasonic and Magnovox, none of the machines will plaay the DVD. But your computer will play it.
